name: GetCreditNoteEmailContent
description:
Retrieve email content for a given credit note.

Use this tool to get the email content associated with a specified credit note by its ID.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the organization to retrieve the credit note email content for. This is a required field.

parameters.name: credit_note_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the credit note to retrieve its email content.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the credit note.

parameters.name: specified_email_template_id
parameters.description: ID of a specific email template. If not provided, defaults to customer's or the default template.

value_schema.description: Get the email content based on a specific email template. If this param is not inputted, then the content will be based on the email template associated with the customer. If no template is associated with the customer, then default template will be used.
